features.feature: 亲爱的用户，本次更新优化健康使用平板功能以及修复部分场景下健康使用平板管控问题，合入安全补丁，推荐您进行更新。
• 新增孩子模式下悬浮窗使用管控统计功能。 • 家长助手与智慧空间融合，通过智慧空间实现远程守护绑定。体验路径：荣耀智慧空间 > 家庭空间 > 添加 > 扫码添加。 • 修复部分场景下健康使用平板管控问题。
• 合入安卓 2025 年 3 月安全补丁，增强系统安全性。有关荣耀软件安全更新内容的信息，请访问荣耀官方网站 https://www.honor.com/cn/support/bulletin/2025/3
1. 本次更新不会删除您的用户数据，但仍建议您在更新前做好数据备份。 2. 更多精彩功能介绍，请访问“玩机技巧”应用。 3. 如果您在使用过程中遇到任何问题，请访问“我的荣耀”应用或访问荣耀官方服务网站 https://www.honor.com/cn/contact-us 寻求支持。

Dear user, this update optimizes the features of Digital Wellbeing and fixes issues with the control function of Digital Wellbeing in some scenarios. It also incorporates a security patch. Update to enjoy the improvements.

• It is able to control and track the use of floating windows in Child mode. • Parental Control is combined with AI Space to achieve Remote Safeguard binding via AI Space. Try it out by going to: HONOR AI Space > Family space > Add > Scan QR code. • Fixes issues with the control function of Digital Wellbeing in some scenarios.

• Android security patch (Mar 2025) has been incorporated for system security. For more information about HONOR Security updates, please visit our website: https://www.honor.com/global/support/bulletin/2025/3

1. Installing this update will not affect your personal data, but it is still recommended to back up your data before updating. 2. Discover more information on product features in the Tips app. 3. If you encounter any issues during use, please get support by going to My HONOR or visiting our website: https://www.honor.com/cn/contact-us.
